Before he could issue a kurt response to Kup, something interferred with hi=
s spark.=A0 It was a jarring feeling, coupled with images and sounds he did=
 not readily recognize.=A0 It was startling, and to prevent anything like t=
hat happening in combat, put an insulating field around the compartment hus=
ing the foreign spark.
=A0
"Relay me your position, Autobot.=A0 I will be t=
here as soon as my present matters are resolved."

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Before he could issue a kurt response to Kup, something interferred with his spark.  It was a jarring feeling, coupled with images and sounds he did not readily recognize.  It was startling, and to prevent anything like that happening in combat, put an insulating field around the compartment husing the foreign spark.</DIV>
